program: Master of Science in Computer Science (MS)

sections.text: Caltech’s Computer Science graduate option provides advanced preparation in CS research areas; the MS degree follows Institute master’s policies with coursework and research units.

items: Minimum 135 units of courses numbered 100+ (including CS 280 research units)
Course selections balanced with adviser guidance
sections.text: Students complete at least 135 graduate‑level units, including research units, with course selections planned alongside an adviser.
